description: Read, update, write and delete data from SeaTable

essential_properties.name: tableName
essential_properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

essential_properties.name: rowId
essential_properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

essential_properties.name: searchColumn
essential_properties.description: Select the column to be searched. Not all column types are supported for search. Choose from the list, or specify a name using an expression.

essential_properties.name: searchString
essential_properties.displayName: Name or email of the collaborator
essential_properties.description: SeaTable identifies users with a unique username like 244b43hr6fy54bb4afa2c2cb7369d244@auth.local. Get this username from an email or the name of a collaborator.

essential_properties.name: tableName
essential_properties.description: Choose from the list, of specify by using an expression. Provide it in the way "table_name:::table_id".

common_operations.name: Get
common_operations.description: Get the content of a row

common_operations.name: Get Many
common_operations.description: Get many rows from a table or a table view

common_operations.name: Lock
common_operations.description: Lock a row to prevent further changes
